name: Diamond love
description:
The protagonist fell in love with a girl next door.
So go to the proposal
However, the other party requires a diamond ring for the promise.
Also tell the protagonist, you can go to kill the dragon to take the diamond ring
Then the protagonist set foot on the road to kill the dragon.


Weapon system

As long as you have enough money, you can buy the right weapons at the store.
The more expensive, the more powerful

Armor system

As long as you have enough money, you can buy the right armor at the store.
The more expensive, the more powerful

Pillar system

You can buy the appropriate medicine at the store for a small fee.
The more expensive, the more powerful

Skill system

You can buy money in the store to cheat.
Learning the corresponding skills
The blood returns to healing, the flame is accompanied by an attack, and the lightning is accompanied by a group injury.

Hierarchical system

There is no level and there is always one level.

Enemy system

All monsters can be seen on the map and can be avoided by moving.
After killing the monster, wait a while to refresh the monster.

The hard working protagonist eventually killed the dragon and got a diamond ring.
Can you meet your lover?
Then I only know it when I play it.
